name: yvarb
description: Run  `ganache-cli`: ``` ganache-cli --fork {NODE_ID} --wallet.defaultBalance 1000000 --wallet.unlockedAccounts 0x3b870db67a45611CF4723d44487EAF398fAc51E3 npx truffle compile npx truffle test .\test\TestYieldLever.sol ```

scripts.createTypings: typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir frontend/src/contracts/YieldStEthLever.sol './out/**/*.json' && typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir frontend/src/contracts/Cauldron.sol './contracts/interfaces/Cauldron.json' && typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir frontend/src/contracts/IOracle.sol './out/IOracle.sol/IOracle.json'
